thread.title: Money From BNP Pact to Back Cyber Alliance
thread.title_full: Money From BNP Pact to Back Cyber Alliance - WSJ

author: Christopher M. Matthews
title: Money From BNP Pact to Back Cyber Alliance
text:
Millions of dollars from one of the largest-ever bank settlements will soon be used to help financial institutions and other companies prevent cyberattacks.
The Manhattan district attorneyâ€™s office is investing $15 million of the $447 million paid by BNP Paribas SA last year to resolve allegations it broke U.S. sanctions to start the Global Cyber Alliance, a nonprofit entity that says it has enlisted Citigroup Inc., U.S. Bancorp,...
